title: Ability Improvements
content:
y Improvements Information

You increase one Ability by 2, or two Abilities by 1, to a maximum of 20. Ability Improvement allows you to assign two ability points however you want in your six abilities. This is particularly good because characters gain a lot from increasing the ability modifier of whatever they use primarily.
